value.description: Describes how metric values are aggregated

oldValue.description: A collection of event categories. Currently possible values are: Administrative, Security, ServiceHealth, Alert, Recommendation, Policy.

value.description: the list that includes the Azure event categories.
Metric availability specifies the time grain (aggregation interval or frequency) and the retention period for that time grain.

location.description: Info about where the metric data is stored

partitionKey.description: partition key in the table where the metrics for this resource are stored

tableEndpoint.description: The url for the storage account

tableInfo.description: Info about the storage tables storing this resources metrics

items.description: Info about a storage table with metric data

endTime.description: End time of the metrics in this table

sasToken.description: For the storage account with metrics

sasTokenExpirationTime.description: For the storage account with metrics

startTime.description: Start time of the metrics in this table

tableName.description: Name of a table with metric data for this resource

retention.description: the retention period for the metric at the specified timegrain.  Expressed as a duration 'PT1M', 'P1D', etc.

timeGrain.description: the time grain specifies the aggregation interval for the metric. Expressed as a duration 'PT1M', 'P1D', etc.

value.value:
Get the list of available event categories supported in the Activity Logs Service.
The current list includes the following: Administrative, Security, ServiceHealth, Alert, Recommendation, Policy.

args.value: Missing OAuth2 access token in .env: AZURE_AUTH_AUTHORIZATIONCODE_ACCESS_TOKEN

value.value:
Get the list of available event categories supported in the Activity Logs Service.
The current list includes the following: Administrative, Security, ServiceHealth, Alert, Recommendation, Policy.
